div.h4: 1. Do you have an existing business that is currently in operation?

div.div: Please explain what you do in your business:

div.h4: 1. Please indicate the Sector in which your business is operating:
2. Please indicate the Legal Entity in which your business is operating:
3. Why did you start the business?
4. Please explain the following in brief:

p.strong: (b) The need the business seeks to satisfy

textarea.name: existing_idea_description_business_need_satisfy
textarea.placeholder: Describe The need the business seeks to satisfy...

textarea.name: existing_idea_description_potential_customers
textarea.placeholder: Describe in brief who are your potential customers...

p.strong: (d) Where you will operate the business from?

textarea.name: existing_idea_description_operate_business
textarea.placeholder: Explain here From where will you operate the business?...

p.strong: (e) How you will deliver your product or service?

textarea.name: existing_idea_description_operate_product_servivces
textarea.placeholder: Explain here how you will deliver your product or service?...

div.h4: 5. How long has the business been in operation and trading?
6. How many people (including yourself) are employed in the business?
7. Has there been a change in the number of people employed in the business over the last 12 months?
8. Please provide an estimate of your annual turnover (total amount of income)
9. Has there been a change in the turnover of the business over the last 12 months?
10. Do you have a separate bank account for the business?
11. Please indicate how you started the business:

select.name: business_start_method
select.option: I started the business with a partner(s)/ friend(s)
I took it over from someone in the family

div.h4: 12. Where did you get the money to start your business?
13. Describe the premises your business operates from:
14. Do you own or rent the premises?
15. Please describe the area in which the business operates:
16. Select your Business's Geographical location and sector in which it operates:
17. How would you describe the growth of the industry sector in which you operate?
18. Does your business comply with industry registration requirements?
19. How many business start-ups have you been involved in?
20. Did you previously work in the industry sector or type of business you currently run?
If yes, for how long?
21. How many years of business management experience do you have?
22. Please describe your business goals for the future:
23. Please indicate what type of business support services you need:
24. Describe how this assistance is likely to improve your business:
25. Are you able to invest time, financial and other resources in improving your business?
26. Please indicate the Ownership status in your business :

tr.th: Name and Surname of Business Partner (incl. Owner)

div.h4: 2. Do you Have a business idea?

h4.b: Section D: START-UP (Have a Business Idea)

div.div: Please explain what you do in your business:

div.h4: 1. Please indicate the Sector in which your business is operating:
2. Please indicate the Legal Entity in which your business is operating:
3. Why do you want to start a business?
4. Please explain the following in brief:

p.strong: (b) The need the business seeks to satisfy

div.h4: 5. Please assess yourself against the following business feasibility requirements:

div.p: a. Do you have the management skills/ experience to start the business?
b. Do you have the technical skills to start the business?
c. Have you identified your potential customers?
d. Do you know who your competitors are?
e. Do you have the money to cover your start-up costs?
f. Do you have enough money to cover the operating costs?
g. Do you have the equipment and machinery required to run the business?

div.h4: 6. Please indicate the Ownership status in your business :

tr.th: Name and Surname of Business Partner (incl. Owner)

div.h4: 7. Please indicate what type of business support services you need:
3. No business Idea/Have not started a business?

h4.b: Section C: PRE-START-UP (no business idea/ have not started a business)

div.h4: 1. Why do you want to start a business?
2. Please describe the goals you want to achieve in business
3. What type of business experience do you have and what type of business do you want to start?
4. What knowledge or expertise do you have that is relevant to the proposed business?
5. Please indicate what type of business support services you need:
Have you ever received any Entrepreneurship Development Training

form.div:
Section G: Supporting Documents for Application
Certified Identity document Copy (stamp not older than 3 months) *
-->
Copy of Company Registration from CIPC *
Company Profile *
Download the employee list template, complete it and upload it back Template Download *
Any other document that might assist your application.
Declaration -
1. I hereby declare that the information provided in this application is, to the best of my knowledge, true and accurate;
2. I hereby declare that I understand the Business Consultancy Services Voucher/Grant terms and conditions and undertake to abide by such terms and conditions;
3. I hereby indemnify the National Youth Development Agency and its Service Providers for any loss or damages whatsoever incurred as a result of an intervention rendered by the Service Provider in good faith.
4. I hereby declare that the information in this application form is fair and a true reflection of the intended business/project and that all the documents accompanying this application are authentic. I further confirm that neither I nor my partner(s) have ever been declared insolvent. I herewith give the National Youth Development Agency permission to conduct a credit history check as well as any other enquiries they may deem necessary to process this application.

div.h2: You have successfully submitted Voucher Application Form
